taskMan.resource

Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • taskMan.resource.Reservation

  • public class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
    A reservation will link a resource (a concrete resource or a user) with a task (reserving the resource). A reservation has a start and an end time. When this reservation is active, the same resource should not be reserved again in a timeslot overlapping with this reservation.
    Author:
    Tim Van Den Broecke, Joran Van de Woestijne, Vincent Van Gestel and Eli Vangrieken

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(ConcreteResource reservedResource,
                   Task reservingTask,
                   java.time.LocalDateTime startTime,
                   java.time.LocalDateTime endTime)
        Construct a new reservation for a resource by a task during a specific timeslot.
        Parameters:
        reservedResource - | The resource that should be reserved
        reservingTask - | The task making the reservation
        startTime - | The time indicating the start of the reservation (the reserved resource is no longer available for use)
        endTime - | The time indicating the end of the reservation (the reserved resource is again available for use)

    • Method Detail

      • getReservedResource

        public ConcreteResource getReservedResource()
        A getter for the reserved resource
        Returns:
        the resource reserved by this reservation

      • getReservingTask

        public Task getReservingTask()
        A getter for the reserving task
        Returns:
        the task reserving the resource contained in this reservation

      • getStartTime

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getStartTime()
        A getter for the start time
        Returns:
        the time when the reservation will be in effect

      • getEndTime

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getEndTime()
        A getter for the end time
        Returns:
        the time when the reservation will no longer be in effect

      • overlaps

        public boolean overlaps(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                        java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        Returns whether the reservation overlaps with a given start and end date.
        Parameters:
        start - The start date
        end - The end date
        Returns:
        true if it overlaps, false otherwise
